form.PN:
pri 1. pomenu besedo izgovarjamo
/rI1s*es/
, pri 2. in 3. pa
/r*i*:ses/
.

sense.def:
A recess
je premor med dvema zasedanjema odbora ali parlamenta.

seg.quote: The committee is going into recess for a couple of weeks.

sense.def:
A recess
je manjši prostor v sobi, ki nastane, če je del stene umaknjen v globino.

The recesses of something
so globoki ali skriti deli nečesa.

seg.quote: I pushed the problem down into the dim recesses of my mind.
